snippet.title: Xochi's Apothecary Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A deceptively cozy narrative game about an alchemist that immigrates to a new country and opens an apothecary. Get to know your weird and wonderful community, brew the potions your customers need, and use your words to stir up a country on the brink of change.

The musical stylings of the Xochi’s Apothecary trailer feature an original composition by Dhruv Visvanath!

Wishlist Xochi's Apothecary on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379750/Xochis_Apothecary/

Stay Updated:
